com.groupone.p2pgame

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupone.p2pgame.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Piece holds information about a single piece. This object will be retained even after the piece has moved into a new square.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Piece()
      Create a single, "nothing" piece.
      Piece(PieceType type, Player player)
      Create a piece from a type and player

    • Method Summary

      Upgrade this piece to a king.
      boolean matches(Piece b)
      See if this piece matches a provided piece.
